Replace.Text: All tiles in the city with wonders have +2 Charisma, and can purchase areas and use [ICON_FAITH] Faith points to purchase shrines, theaters, and buildings in Croak Film and Television Park [NewLine] Holy shrines, theaters, and Crook Film and Television Park +2[ICON_CULTURE]Culture value +2[ICON_FAITH]Faith value +2[ICON_GOLD] gold coins, stunning and charming cells +4[ICON_CULTURE]Culture value +4[ICON_FAITH]Faith value +4[ICON_GOLD ]gold
"People often say that the more discerning the diners' tastes are, the more sophisticated the chef's skills will be. No matter what others say, I will always be the most discerning listener."
Thousands of notes playing in chorus, fugue among the stars

The unit trained by Mockingbird has the ability Concerto·Drunken Overture. Concerto·Drunken Overture will provide the civilization with [ICON_CULTURE] culture value and [ICON_FAITH] faith value bonus when not engaged in combat. When the unit is located When the cell [ICON_FAITH] faith value and [ICON_CULTURE] culture value output is high or the civilization has improved characteristics and improved palace merchants and more levies, Concerto·Tonal Chorus or Concerto·Cadenza will be added to provide more High [ICON_CULTURE] culture value and [ICON_FAITH] faith value bonus. [NewLine] When a unit engages in battle, it will lose Concerto·Drunken Overture, Concerto·Tonal Chorus, Concerto·Cadenza, and will change to Concerto·Flapping White Sound or Concerto depending on the active and passive situation of the battle. ·The aria of feathers is also affected by the [ICON_FAITH] faith value and [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value output of the cell where the unit is located, or the number of improved palace merchant horn levy feathers that the civilization has improved. It will add a concerto, a model segment or a concert. Play and improvise decoration.
If we have a pair of wings, we will fly into the sky [NewLine] - even if we are destined to fall. [NewLine]Don’t be greedy for eternity, don’t be afraid of the moment.
The capital city is the only one that can be built, providing all-round bonuses and 3 [ICON_GreatWork_Music] music masterpiece slots, which will be automatically themed.

Provides [ICON_GreatMusician] great musician points, a large amount of [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value and [ICON_GOLD] gold coins. If it is adjacent to the theater, holy land and special improved palace Shangjiao Zhengyu, you will get the corresponding output. If it is adjacent to the wonders, you will get [ICON_FAITH]. Faith value, [ICON_GOLD] gold coin output, will provide additional housing based on charm. [NewLine] All charming cells in the city +1 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins, and stunningly charming cells +3 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins.
Provides Pinoconi, the Gala Star, with a governor title and a general policy slot

+1 spy capacity and gain 1 spy immediately. Diplomatic visibility increases by 1 level. When a spy is captured or killed, the enemy spy will provide 50 [ICON_CULTURE] culture value and 50 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins for each level of upgrade of the enemy spy.
Units trained in this city have +2 [ICON_MOVEMENT] mobility and +50% experience gain

Five characteristic improvements, with different improvement conditions, respectively provide 75% of the land's charm [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value, [ICON_FAITH] faith value, [ICON_GOLD] gold coins, [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value, in order Neighbors will receive additional bonuses, and cities with 1/3/5 characteristic improvements in order will produce +1/+2/+3 for all cities. After completing all improvements and construction, [ICON_FAITH] faith points can be directly used Purchase "Dream Theater Company".

Regular melee units are given as gifts after completing the characteristic and improved Gongshangjiao Conquest in order (only the first 10 units can be purchased with the [ICON_FAITH] faith value after completing the entire series of construction), and additionally possess the characteristics of the improved Gongshangjiao that are equivalent to the improved characteristics of the civilization. [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power of total number of feathers
The additional [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power coefficient obtained from the characteristic improved Gong Shang Jiao Zhengyu is +1, and the experience value increased by +1 each round
The additional [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power coefficient obtained from the characteristic improved Gong Shang Jiao Zhengyu is +2, and the experience value increased by +1 each round
+1 attack times, you can still move after attacking, you can still attack after moving
The additional [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power coefficient obtained from the characteristic improved Gong Shang Jiao Zhengyu is +3, and the experience value increased by +1 each round
Concert·Tonal Chorus: +1[ICON_FAITH] faith value, nearby friendly units +1[ICON_FAITH] faith value
Concerto·Cadenza Coloratura: +1% [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value for the whole city

Concert·Flapping White Sound: When obtained, the number of attacks and [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement will be reset immediately, +3[ICON_STRENGTH] combat power, if the enemy unit is injured, an additional +3[ICON_STRENGTH] combat power will be gained, and the unit that kills will be captured. As a builder, all our units that kill units will exert 5 loyalty pressure on nearby enemy cities (can be stacked)

Concerto·Aria of Feathers: When obtained, all health points are immediately restored and promoted, causing nearby enemy combat units to have -2[ICON_STRENGTH] combat effectiveness, and can obtain 2[ICON_STRENGTH] combat effectiveness from nearby promoted units.

Concert·Module: +1[ICON_MOVEMENT] movement, +1 vision. Killing a unit will permanently +1[ICON_STRENGTH] combat power for the unit, and convert 5% of the enemy's [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power into [ICON_CULTURE] ]Culture value and [ICON_FAITH] faith value (can be superimposed)

Concert·Improvisation Decoration: The battle will cause an additional 5 fixed damage. The battle will add 5 experience points to itself and surrounding friendly units and restore 5 + 50% of the lost health.
"Dream Troupe": It has an additional [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power equal to Gong Shang Jiao Zheng Yu's total number x2. Attacking will steal 5 experience points from the opponent.
Build the Holy Land, Theater, Crocker Film and Television Park, Clockboy Screening Area, Hanu Gang Base, Hamster Ball Park +100% [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, but all unit maintenance costs +2

+4[ICON_GOLD] Gold coins come from stunning charm

The cell needs to have at least 1 charm value, providing [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value equal to 75% of the cell's charm value, adjacent to "Feather" +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value, adjacent to "Commerce" +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Cultural value. After possessing radio technology, tourism performance will be provided based on the charm value.

The cell needs to have at least 2 charm values, providing [ICON_FAITH] faith value equal to 75% of the cell's charm value. Adjacent to the "Palace" +2 [ICON_CULTURE] culture value, adjacent to the "Corner" +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith value. After possessing radio technology, tourism performance will be provided based on the charm value.

The cell needs to have at least 3 charm value, providing [ICON_GOLD] gold coins equal to 75% of the cell's charm value, adjacent to "Shang" +2 [ICON_FAITH] faith value, adjacent to "Zheng" +2 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins , after possessing radio technology, it provides travel results based on the charm value.

The cell needs to have at least 2 charm value, which provides [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity equal to 75% of the cell's charm value. Adjacent to "Corner" +2 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins, adjacent to "Feather" +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity. Having radio technology provides travel performance based on charm value

The cell needs to have at least 1 charm value, providing [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value equal to 75% of the cell's charm value, adjacent to "Zheng" +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, adjacent to "Palace" +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] technology Value, after possessing radio technology, travel performance will be provided based on the charm value.

The development speed of all cities is +50%, and the charm value of all cells in all cities is +2. After completion, any area built by this civilization will release a cultural bomb.
After completion, the city will have +1 population, and the music masterpieces in all cities will have +1 [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value +1 [ICON_FAITH] faith value. It can be run up to 6 times.
Concerto·Flapping Wings White Sound: +3[ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength (due to enemy damage)
+{Property}[ICON_STRENGTH] Combat strength comes from each unit killed
+{Property}[ICON_STRENGTH]The combat power comes from the improved characteristics of civilization, the improved Gong Shang Jiao Zheng Yu
All cities have +4 livability, and ecstatic cities have an additional +10% total output.
Swinging alone in the Milky Way
After a declared war, all other civilizations will declare war on the declaring civilization and gain double war exhaustion sentiment.
wish to have feathers and wings
After completing the municipal administration, 50% of the cultural value consumed by the municipal administration will be converted into gold coins and technology value.
